name: Jump Space (ScageDev)
description:
Hello,

the system based on Flappy Bird mechanics, was created in 3 hours, 1 hour for programming and 2 hours for programming optimization.

I'm not reinventing anything, and the game was created for the purpose of creating a new formation for my youtube channel with Playmaker and Unity.

have fun making your best score and sharing it here. personally I did not do better than 7.

have fun see you soon
